title: About this portfolio
shortDescription: My custom-built developer portfolio built with React and Next.js. Highlights personal projects, showcases accessibility and performance best practices, and serves as both a technical playground and professional introduction.

features.text: Achieved 100/100 in Performance and SEO, and above 90 in Accessibility and Best Practices on Lighthouse audits, demonstrating strong attention to frontend performance, semantic markup, and modern web standards.
Built as a dynamic, component-based React app with reusable layouts and structured project data, making content updates easy and consistent.
For this project, I focused heavily on accessibility and SEO from the ground up — using semantic HTML, aria-labels, keyboard navigation, meta tags, and structured data.
Designed to reflect my personality and creative style while remaining highly readable and user-friendly across screen sizes.
Yes, I turned my portfolio into one of the portfolio projects. Meta, I know — but also the best way to show what I can build when I care about every detail.
